title: Genty Akylone
text: The Genty Akylone is a <a href="sports%20car">sports car</a> developed by the French automobile manufacturer Genty Automobile. The vehicle, limited to 15 <a href="coup%C3%A9">coupé</a>s and 10 <a href="Roadster%20%28automobile%29">roadster</a>s, has been built in <a href="Saint-Pour%C3%A7ain-sur-Sioule">Saint-Pourçain-sur-Sioule</a> since 2017; development started in 2011.
